Watch the following videos to learn more about the Assign Message policy.

Video Description
Improve API performance using API caching in Apigee Edge Understand the advantages of using API caching on Apigee Edge.
Advantages of API caching using Apigee Edge Understand the advantages of using API caching on Apigee Edge.
Manage data changes on the backend with API caching Learn how to clear the cached data if data changes on the backend.
Skip cache data using Apigee Edge Learn how to skip cache data based on runtime conditions so that you can selectively cache API response data based on requirements.
Expire cache data using Response Cache policy Learn how to expire the cache using cache expiration settings in the policy.
Cache resources using Apigee Edge Learn how to categorize API cache data into different cache resources so that you can flush all at once or have different expiration settings.
Dynamic API caching using Cache Keys Learn how to cache API responses dynamically based on API Request variables in Response Cache Policy and Cache Keys.
